author: Anumeha Chaturvedi
title: 4000 foreign tourists stuck in India following visa suspension
description: 4000 foreign tourists stuck in India following visa suspensionWhile different countries have been operating flights and charters to bring back their tourists, government officials are hoping the launch of the stranded in India website on Tuesday by the minist…
content: New Delhi: Twenty days after India enforced a blanket travel ban for overseas tourists and suspended all tourist visas amidst the Covid-19 outbreak, about 4000 foreign tourists are stuck in the country, government officials and travel industry sources familia… [+3655 chars]
